name: Endless Days (616 GAMES)
description:
Camera: First Person.

Control: Mouse and Keyboard only.

Graphics: PSX graphics style, inspired by old ps1 games.

Duration: Short game but has a medium duration. About 25 to 40 minutes.

NOTE:

The game was inspired by the 2019 movie "The Lighthouse"... and the game "No One Lives Under The Lighthouse".
